Module jBomberman
Package controller

Class StateAbstract

java.lang.Object
controller.StateAbstract
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameState
Direct Known Subclasses:
StateContinue, StateGameOver, StatePaused, StatePlaying, StateStarter, StateWinLevel, StateWinStage
public abstract class StateAbstract extends Object implements GameState
This abstraction holds the instances of its sub-types and it supplies them with some utility methods. Its actual Thread Game reference is updated on transition of state. Transitions of states are defined in concrete GameState or by GameOptionListener's performance.
